this_title: Best in Class: The Making of a Concours d'Elegance
introduction: Everyone has a cherished memory with a vehicle - they have an emotional appeal and can take you on adventures that create everlasting impressions on your life. The inaugural Concours d’Elegance held at the Audrain Automobile Museum is a motor week unlike any other – filled with grandeur and elegance while featuring some of the rarest and most prestigious cars in the world. Presented and judged by experts in the global collector car field, this is one of the finest celebrations of restored and preserved cars where fans, collectors, and everyday spectators gather to dream and share their love of the automobile.
chinese_title: Best in Class: The Making of a Concours d'Elegance
